name: Danger Dudes
description:
The fight of the century is at your fingertips! Control one of four characters to fight against your friends in this 4 player local-Multiplayer brawler game. With multiple abilities per character the possibilities for chaos are endless! Fight 2v2 in a 4 player TDM mode! Use your abilities, and dangerous arenas to defeat your friends and become king of Danger! 

Currently there are 6 polished (and dangerous) maps to 

Note: The game is Free To Play until February 1st, 2019
